bill.summary:
Disaster Relief Fund Replenishment Act of 2024
This bill provides $7 billion in emergency funding for the Federal Emergency Management Agency to carry out the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act with respect to major disasters.
